name: Week 3
description:
I ran out of time to complete this game, so please be aware that this is a hot buggy mess.

Controls - Right click to move, space to throw cargo

Click on cargo to pick it up, throw it into the cargo chute (big grey box on the left of the ship) to jettison it out to space. Click on the command chair to view the screen.
